Question.Subject: firefox vs internet explorer?
Question.Content: hey i like using firefox better , coz its faster , lighter and less crappy , although i have one very useful advantage when using internet explorer , that is when using youtube . when the video streams completely , i just click download (using realplayer) and it downloads instantly , while its not the case with firefox , it downloads but not instantly. wanted to know if i have my firefox settings wrong , or something with cookies and stuff i dont know about thanks :)
Question.ChosenAnswer: you cant really get internet explorer completely out your system because your pc needs some internet exp to make some its programs run correct i use firefox also,which i never have issues with but for certain things,the pc has a mind of itsown and at times uses intenet exp,like i said there some parts of the pc that really need int explorer to work right i wouldnt worry your str8

Answer.Content: you cant really get internet explorer completely out your system because your pc needs some internet exp to make some its programs run correct i use firefox also,which i never have issues with but for certain things,the pc has a mind of itsown and at times uses intenet exp,like i said there some parts of the pc that really need int explorer to work right i wouldnt worry your str8
No dude... Those things are related to features of a browser... So that's that... Ok.. Happy surfing
